title: Roast Peking Duck
ingredients: ['1 (1.8kg) whole duck', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/4 teaspoon ground white pepper', '1/8 teaspoon ground cloves', '3 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 tablespoon honey', '1 orange, sliced in rounds', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, for garnish', '5 spring onions', '170g plum jam', '1 1/2 teaspoons sugar', '1 1/2 teaspoons malt vinegar', '4 tablespoons finely chopped chutney']
